main.name: Patgio Kwok
main.description: I'm a software developer with a focus on building intuitive and scalable digital experiences. Solving real problems with modern solutions.
main.bio: I'm a self-motivated Software Developer based in Vancouver, BC. I enjoy learning new technologies and applying them to solve problems and optimize solutions that have real-world impact. I studied Digital Processing techniques in school, but have since pivoted into web development. I am most experienced with Ruby on Rails and React & Redux for quick prototyping and scalability.

resume.skillmessage: I am well experienced in Web Development and actively learning new developments for the latest web technologies, such as Prisma. I am always looking for new ways to broaden my development skills and put them to practice.

education.degree: Diploma of Computer Systems Technology (Digital Processing Option)
description: A diploma program that combines computer systems theory with hands-on experience in software development
Relevant Coursework: • Object Oriented Programming I & II • Data Structures and Algorithms  • Web App Development • Computer Architecture

work.title: Software Engineer Intern
description: Worked extensively with React & Redux to develop features for the front-end team
Automated the workflow processes for all the front-end Git PRs
Developed a feature flagging framework that is used for all the front-end projects
Contributed to daily agile scrum meetings, code reviews, technical documentation, and sprint planning

projects.title: Reddit Clone
projects.category: Fullstack clone of Reddit built with Ruby on Rails

projects.title: Pathfinding Visualizer
projects.category: A React web app for visualizing different pathfinding algorithms
